trans-unit.source: How to: Create a New Variable (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Cómo: crear una nueva Variable (Visual Basic) | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: How to: Create a New Variable (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Cómo: Crear una nueva variable (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: You create a variable with a [Dim Statement](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/dim-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: Crear una variable con un [Dim (instrucción)](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/dim-statement.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a new variable
trans-unit.target: Para crear una nueva variable

trans-unit.source: Declare the variable in a `Dim` statement.
trans-unit.target: Declare la variable en un `Dim` instrucción.

trans-unit.source: Include specifications for the variable's characteristics, such as [Private](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/private.md), [Static](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/static.md), [Shadows](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/shadows.md), or [WithEvents](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/withevents.md).
trans-unit.target: Incluyen especificaciones para las características de la variable, como [privada](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/private.md), [estático](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/static.md), [sombras](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/shadows.md), o [WithEvents](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/withevents.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Declared Element Characteristics](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-characteristics.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [características de los elementos declarados](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-characteristics.md).

trans-unit.source: You do not need the `Dim` keyword if you use other keywords in the declaration.
trans-unit.target: No es necesario el `Dim` palabra clave si utiliza otras palabras clave en la declaración.

trans-unit.source: Follow the specifications with the variable's name, which must follow [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] rules and conventions.
trans-unit.target: Siga con el nombre de la variable, que debe seguir las especificaciones de [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] reglas y convenciones.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Declared Element Names](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-names.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [nombres de elementos declarados](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-names.md).

trans-unit.source: Follow the name with the [As](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/as-clause.md) clause to specify the variable's data type.
trans-unit.target: Siga con el nombre de la [como](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/as-clause.md) cláusula para especificar el tipo de datos de la variable.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the data type, it uses the default: `Object`.
trans-unit.target: Si no especifica el tipo de datos, utiliza el valor predeterminado: `Object`.

trans-unit.source: Follow the `As` clause with an equal sign (`=`) and follow the equal sign with the variable's initial value.
trans-unit.target: Siga el `As` cláusula con un signo igual (`=`) y siga el signo igual con el valor inicial de la variable.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] assigns the specified value to the variable every time it runs the `Dim` statement.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]asigna el valor especificado a la variable cada vez que se ejecuta el `Dim` instrucción.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify an initial value, [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] assigns the default initial value for the variable's data type when it first enters the code that contains the `Dim` statement.
trans-unit.target: Si no especifica un valor inicial, [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] asigna el valor inicial predeterminado para el tipo de datos de la variable cuando escribe por primer vez el código que contiene el `Dim` instrucción.

trans-unit.source: If the variable is a reference type, you can create an instance of its class by including the [New Operator](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/new-operator.md) keyword in the `As` clause.
trans-unit.target: Si la variable es un tipo de referencia, puede crear una instancia de su clase incluyendo la [nuevo operador](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/new-operator.md) palabra clave en el `As` cláusula.

trans-unit.source: If you do not use `New`, the initial value of the variable is [Nothing](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md).
trans-unit.target: Si no utiliza `New`, el valor inicial de la variable es [nada](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md).
